required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficiency and Outcomes of Stress-Only Anger and D-SPECT Stress-Only SPECT MPI
clinical_study.official_title: Rapid-Acquisition Low-Dosimetry Tc-99m Stress-Only Myocardial Perfusion SPECT on the Spectrum Dynamics System: Comparison of Efficiency and Outcomes With Stress-Only Anger SPECT

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare clinical efficiency and patient outcomes using ultra low-dose stress only Tc-99m and solid-state SPECT versus traditional Anger SPECT.

primary_outcome.description: Diagnostic failure is defined by a composite of need for additional downstream testing (anger SPECT, MPI PET, stress echocardiography or coronary CT angiography) within 30 days or a coronary angiogram with no stenoses greater than or equal to 50% severity using quantitative coronary angiography.

secondary_outcome.measure: Necessity to proceed to a rest image
secondary_outcome.description: The first of 4 secondary end-points is the need to proceed to a rest image.

The second of four secondary endpoints the need for additional downstream testing within 30 days to address the same clincial reason for the innitial referral for stress-onoly imaging, in the absence of any changes in clincial status between tests.
The third of four secondary end-points is the occurrence of coronary angiography with no stenoses greater than or equal to 50% severity using quantitative coronary angiography.

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine optimal performance of the Spectrum Dynamics camera system for stress only imaging
secondary_outcome.description: The fourth of four secondary endpoints is to determine optimal performance of the Spectrum Dynamics camera system for stress only imaging: upright imaging alone, supine imaging alone, or both in terms of primary and secondary endpoints

arm_group.arm_group_label: Stress Only SPECT MPI with Anger Camera
arm_group.description: Patients undergoing clinically-indicated stress-only sestamibi studies who are imaged on the traditional Anger camera

arm_group.arm_group_label: Stress Only SPECT MPI with SD Camera
arm_group.description: Patients undergoing clinically-indicated stress-only sestamibi studies who are imaged on the Spectrum Dynamics camera system.

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients referred for clinically-indicated myocardial perfusion SPECT

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI < 35 kg/m2
- LVEF > 40%
- Exercise stress
- Elective out-patients
- No known CAD (>50%) by catheterization
- No history of prior myocardial infarction
Exclusion Criteria:
- LBBB
- Pacemaker
- Atrial Fibrillation
- Frequent PAC's or PVC's
- Inability to achieve at least 6 minutes

facility.name: Saint Luke's North Cardiovascular Imaging Center
Saint Luke's East Cardiovascular Imaging Center

responsible_party.name_title: Timothy M. Bateman, MD, Medical Director
